thread.title: Ramirez, Ortega carry McCollum past Jefferson
thread.title_full: Ramirez, Ortega carry McCollum past Jefferson - San Antonio Express-News

author: Mike Considine, For the Express-News
title: Ramirez, Ortega carry McCollum past Jefferson
text:
The expected showcase between two of the best backs in District 28-5A didn’t disappoint in the slightest.
McCollum’s Mike Ramirez finished with 236 yards on 25 carries, while Jefferson’s Jesse Flores picked up 245 on 29 tries. But McCollum had another high-yardage back to draw from Friday at Alamo Stadium.
Junior quarterback Jordan Ortega also surpassed the 100-yard mark with help from a 43-yard touchdown run that gave the Cowboys a cushion in their 48-28 win. Ortega gained 121 rushing yards on 14 attempts and passed for two scores in the key district victory.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com.
